impermanent.loss.section.description.message: Revolutionary pool architecture completely eliminates the impermanent loss problem that plagues traditional AMM protocols

impermanent.loss.section.traditional.des.message: When token prices deviate from their initial ratio, liquidity providers lose value compared to simply holding the tokens.

impermanent.loss.section.ttswap.descript.message: Our constant value algorithm maintains proportional value regardless of price fluctuations, completely eliminating impermanent loss.

impermanent.loss.section.ttswap.example..message: Initial deposit: 100 Token A, 200 Token B
Upon withdrawal: 100 Token A, 200 Token B
Additional rewards: 10 Token A, 15 Token B

impermanent.loss.section.technical.step1.message: Real-time continuous monitoring of pool total value

impermanent.loss.section.technical.step2.message: Automatically adjust pool ratios to maintain value

impermanent.loss.section.technical.step3.message: Mathematical guarantee of zero impermanent loss

liquidityBenefits.benefits.amplification.message: Innovative liquidity amplification mechanism allows single liquidity to earn multi-fold fee returns, maximizing your capital efficiency

liquidityBenefits.benefits.mining.descri.message: Providing liquidity automatically participates in TTS token mining, earning platform governance token rewards and enjoying protocol growth dividends

liquidityBenefits.yieldBoosts.subtitle.message: Through multi-tiered yield optimization strategies, ensure liquidity providers receive maximum returns

liquidityBenefits.cta.description.message: Join the TTSwap ecosystem, enjoy multiple yield stacking, and maximize your return on every unit of liquidity

lossReduction.method1.subtitle.message: Concentrate multi-pool liquidity into a single pool

rewards.section.roles.tokenManager.descr.message: When users first add a token to the platform, they become token managers, representing community-delegated token operations.

rewards.section.roles.liquidityProvider..message: Users who provide liquidity automatically become liquidity providers, sharing the majority of trading fees.
Automatically gain status after providing liquidity

rewards.section.roles.serviceProvider.de.message: Service providers who offer trading, investment, and other DeFi services to users.

rewards.section.roles.referrer.descripti.message: Users who refer others to the platform can earn commission from their referees' trading fees.

rewards.section.roles.user.description.message: Regular users who add referrers enjoy trading fee discounts on all trading activities.

rewards.section.roles.user.details.1.message: Enjoy 10% trading fee discount with referrer

rewards.section.roles.community.descript.message: Community provides technical support and development, earning platform fee share.

rewards.section.description.message: Revolutionary multi-role commission system ensures all platform participants fairly share trading fees

tokenomics.section.distribution.partners.message: Core members who persisted and believed in the project during early stages
Initial price determined when member joins, unlock ratio ≤1/16 when price doubles, unlocked portion not destroyed when leaving community
Initial price determined when member joins, unlock ratio ≤1/14 when price doubles, unlocked portion destroyed when leaving community

Full-time and part-time employees contributing through their roles
Equity incentives given to key employees and contributors
Rewards for participating in community activities and events
General community contributors and active participants

tokenomics.section.distribution.capitalC.message: Institutional and strategic investors providing capital
Public sale participants with fully unlocked status

tokenomics.section.rights.supervision.de.message: Right to supervise all community actions

tokenomics.section.rights.proposal.descr.message: Proposal rights for holders of certain token amounts

tokenomics.section.features.lock.descrip.message: All in locked state, unlocked only when conditions are met

tokenomics.section.features.buyback.desc.message: All community profits used to buy and burn tokens

tokenomics.section.description.message: Innovative token economic protocol based on 4C growth community, ensuring long-term value growth and fair distribution

tokenomics.section.distribution.descript.message: Fair and transparent token distribution based on community contribution model

tokenomics.section.mechanism.description.message: Layered unlock mechanism based on price doubling to ensure stable token value growth

tokenomics.section.mechanism.unlock.requ.message: Initial price cannot be lower than current price
When price doubles, unlock remaining portion × unlock ratio

tokenomics.section.mechanism.calculation.message: Allocate 20,000 tokens, unlock ratio 18%, allocation price 0.05

tokenomics.section.mechanism.rules.typeA.message: Unlocked portion not destroyed when leaving community

tokenomics.section.mechanism.rules.typeB.message: Unlocked portion destroyed when leaving community

tokenomics.section.mechanism.rules.contr.message: Initial price higher than allocation price
Unlocked portion adjusted by community based on performance, no longer for community service when leaving

tokenomics.section.mechanism.rules.capit.message: Investment portion price and unlock ratio determined through negotiation, ≤1/8
Airdrop portion determined by specific activity plans, ≤1/8

tokenomics.section.governance.descriptio.message: Token holders enjoy full rights to information, supervision, voting, and proposal

tokenomics.section.governance.process.tr.message: All decisions and actions disclosed to token holders to ensure transparency

tokenomics.section.governance.process.pr.message: Users with a certain amount of tokens can initiate community proposals

tokenomics.section.governance.process.vo.message: All token holders can participate in proposal voting decisions

tokenomics.section.economy.description.message: Through buyback and burn mechanisms, build a long-term sustainable token economic ecosystem

tokenomics.section.economy.value.item1.message: All project profits used for token buyback

tokenomics.section.economy.value.item2.message: Token holder income comes from value appreciation or project contributions

tokenomics.section.economy.value.item3.message: No profit from harming any participant

tokenomics.section.economy.value.item4.message: Recommendation relationships maintained in tokens, once confirmed cannot be modified

tokenomics.section.economy.deflation.buy.message: All community profits used to buy and burn tokens

tokenomics.section.economy.deflation.vol.message: Any participant can only unlock in proportion when price doubles
